snippet: Joseph J. Lhota’s first television advertisement of the general election campaign draws comparisons between Mr. Lhota and his Democratic rival, Bill de Blasio.
abstract: Joseph J. Lhota’s first television advertisement of the general election campaign draws comparisons between Mr. Lhota and his Democratic rival, Bill de Blasio.

headline.main: The Ad Campaign: Lhota on the Common Ground
headline.print_headline: The Ad Campaign: Lhota on the Common Ground
